TaxCode.description: The unique code of the tax e.g VAT20

TaxSchemeCode.description: The scheme of the tax e.g VAT

TaxTypeCode.description: The type of the tax e.g Sales

TaxGroupId.description: The group id this tax code is part of

TaxGroupCode.description: The group code this tax code is part of

IsTaxExempt.description: Is this tax line a tex exempt one? e.g Y

TaxRate.description: The tax rate as a percentage e.g 20.00

GLCode.description: A GL code associated with this Tax

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
